Although you may be upset, you will not back down from this argument without a fight. Why should your dignity be taken away from you just because your mother now has control over you? You scream at her, demanding her to change things back to normal. But to your dismay, she simply shakes her head as you begin to shrink once more.

You were now under the mercy of even your little sister. Now at 9 years of age, you notice that your blonde hair has been wrapped in braids, the same as which any other blonde little girl would have. You've also become quite chubby for your age. Although you felt very vulnerable, it was also hard to notice the sudden chubbiness that you've developed. Although it is very disheartening to look up at the terrifying figure that your mother has become, you still rebel against her will by screaming a shouting on the spot. However Barbara simply smirks down upon you and shakes her head, like she was patiently waiting for you to succumb to her will. All she said to you next was "What chubby little cheeks you've got!" To see a chubby 9 year old girl scream and shout in one spot was a pathetic sight for her, and because of your stubbornness, you begin to shrink even further.

Barbara has started to look more like a giant than your mother as another 2 years of your life is replaced by freckles and a much shorter stature. You could feel some of the bones in your body begin to fade as the skin around them bloats a little further. You were now a chubby little 7-year old girl. Your will has started to crack. The world was becoming far too big for you to feel brave enough to face it. You now cannot be any taller than Barbara's fat leg, although you was certainly much wider. As a small tear traces down your chubby left cheek you once again scream at your giant mother, still refusing to give in to her might.

Waiting to be shrunk once more, Barbara begins to speak to you. "Eddy, you can't keep this up. This effect will last until you're just one year old. Pretty soon you will lose the ability to speak. You will lose the ability to walk. You will lose all of the strength in your body. Even a fall off the sofa could harm you. It would be for the best if you just give in before it's too late. Because let's face it. I've already won."

She was right. She may be evil, even more evil than you thought your older sister Melina was, but she was right. You could stop rebelling against her and do whatever she says, or you could fight back until you lose the power to do absolutely anything by yourself. Either way your mother will have her way with you. Your only chance of returning back to normal are those precious Rainbow Drops, but it's too late to even come close to getting to them. You've become far too small, weak and fragile to risk it. And no one else can help you. The only people who know are Barbara and yourself. And who do you think that the others are going to believe? A little girl or the mother of four? It's no use. You have to concede. You have to give up, as long as you still have some power to things for yourself left.

Suddenly you begin to shrink even more. Another 2 years have been lost. Now only 5 years of age, you stood at a mere 3 feet and 2 inches tall, with cute little pigtails and a chubby frame. You look down and notice that your clothes have turned into a pink, frilly dress. You would be the perfect little girl if you just lost a couple more pounds, but that was the last of your current worries. You keep facing the ground in shame as your mother looms over you, wondering what you were doing.

"Eddy?" Barbara asks. "Have you given up? Are you going to start behaving?"

You let out a big sigh. You've been defeated. "Yes. You win. I give in. I'll be good." And with an equally big sigh of relief, Barbara swallows a Purple Drop and wishes that you'd stay this way from now on.

Overwhelmed with joy, Barbara drops down to her knees and embraces you with her flabby arms to hug you. "There's a good girl" she says happily. As she squeezes you in her arms, you simply look over her huge shoulder with a look of disgrace.

Barbara then raises back onto one knee and looks down on you with a smile. "Firstly we're going to have to change your name. What kind of a name for a cute, chubby little girl like you is Eddy?" It wasn't the fact that she insists on changing your name that bothered you, but the fact that she called you chubby! Barbara continues. "I like Nancy. How would you like to be called Nancy?" The tone of her voice was patronizing. She didn't care whether you refused or not! Whether you liked it or not, you better get used to be called Nancy, because from the look of your mother's face, this was your life from now on.

Your mother raises back onto her feet. The sight of her giant frame sends a shiver down your spine.

But what happens from here?

"You know Nancy, if your going to stay like this from now on, you'll have to learn to act your age." Your mother seems very excited about you being a 5 year old chubby little girl, despite your obvious feelings about the situation.

You have to get used to being chubby. You have to get used to being a girl. You have to get used to being 5 years old. You have to get used to being called Nancy. You have to get used to being the smallest in the entire family. All you can do is dread what is going to happen to you from now on. As you ignore Barbara babbling to you, you begin to ponder to yourself about your new life.

If you are to live like this for the rest of your life the first thing that comes to mind is your weight. You're quite fat for a girl of your age, and there was no doubt that unless you do something about it then you're just going to keep growing and growing, more than likely until you're the size of Aunt Susan! You also know that a girl has a lot to do to keep herself looking good. A woman's lifestyle is completely to a man's lifestyle and you have to get used to that. But it's not just your lifestyle that you have to worry about in the future. You remember your siblings.

How will you be treated by your siblings. Your eldest sister, Melina Burton, isn't exactly a pleasant girl to put up with. There is the possibility that she will move out of the house before your age reaches double digits, but right now she's still a resident. You know that Melina treats Jessica pretty well, but she's smart enough to realize that your weren't just born today. You've always had a bad relationship with her. You've tormented each other for years. You've both waited years for the other to be stuck in a situation like this. What would happen if she found out who you were? She could make your life a living hell. You won't be able to defend yourself against her like this! Then that brings you to another thought. Jessica Burton used to be the smallest in the family. You've known her long enough to know that all she ever wanted was a baby sister, and now her dream has come true. Not only are you her little sister, but if she wanted to, she could have complete control over you. And by the time you reach her age, she'll already be the same age as Stacey! You dread what Jessica has in store for you. And then you come to Stacey Morgan, your old girlfriend. What will she make of all this? Not only has she lost her boyfriend, but she has also lost a friend. And from now on she'll be treating you and talking to you like a little girl, at least if she doesn't recognize you. And if she does, she may not want to talk to you ever again! Hundreds of thoughts flurried across your mind until Barbara manages to catch your attention again.

Your mother breaks you off your trace of thought and shares her next idea with you. "But I can be quite impatient, and this is only the beginning. I want to see what kind of girl you grow up to become." Her thought confuses you until she makes a suggestion. "Maybe I'll wish myself into the future and find out myself!"

Barbara is actually considering wishing herself into the future! Is she mad!? But there's not much that you can do really. You've promised her that you would do whatever she wants, and if you refuse then she'll wish that you were another 2 years younger. All you can do is watch.

"Yes," Barbara continues, "I think I will. I want to see what you'll be like at little Jessica's age. That'll teach you for being so mean to my little girl!"

She reads the instructions on the side of the packet of Rainbow Drops and notices something. Orange Drops only last for 24 hours. This should be enough time for her to find out what kind of girl that you'll become. So she takes an orange drop out of the packet and puts it in between her lips.

An alarm clock rings. You slowly open your eyes and struggle to roll over your bed. You reach out. The flab dangles from your arms as you turn the clock off. You slowly sit up to a vertical bed and open your eyes to a bedroom with blue wallpaper and posters of men on the wall.

You climb out of bed, scraping your thighs across the edge of the bed. With your feet on the floor you look down on your body. Your body is completely covered with curves. Every footstep you make creates a small crack on the floor.

After brushing your teeth and combing your hair, you overhear your father's voice from below. "Nancy! Time for Breakfast!" The word breakfast has always been very attractive to you. You sit on the chair, which almost cracks under your weight, and see a big breakfast looking back at you. Fried egg, streaky bacon, sausages, hash browns and a cup of coffee. Just like what you have every night! As you begin to chow down on your meal, your father, David Burton, now approaching the age of 59, sits down besides you and tucks into his small breakfast.

You've been growing up like this for years now. Ever since you was 5-years of age, back when your mother disappeared. And since you were 13-years of age, you've been living alone with your father in the family home after your sister, Jessica, moved out of the house. For 5 years it has always been the same. You are single and unemployed, but still you have plans to move away into a small flat in a couple of weeks, despite your father's disapproval.

After quickly finishing your breakfast, still feeling a bit peckish, you enter the lounge and park your huge butt on the sofa. You sink into the sofa as you flick over the channels on television with the remote. You then notice your father preparing to leave for work. He enters the room and says goodbye as he pecks you on the cheek. You hear the door close behind him as you are left home alone. How did you ever end up like this?

Suddenly you hear a loud bang from the hallway. You turn your head and check on it, and you are temporarily blinded by a flash of light. You rub your eyes, rather than the chunks of meat sticking to your lips, and you check once more. Curiously you stumble back to your feet and enter the hallway to investigate. There you see someone of which you have not seen since you were 5-years old!

It was Barbara Burton, your mother, who disappeared just after doing something to you that you can't remember right now. Although she looks younger than you expected. She should be about 58-years old by now, but instead she looks 18 years younger. You notice a bag of candy in her hand, but despite how much you wanted to pinch them, you were more curious with this figure standing in the hallway who was looking at you in disgust.

"Eddy?" she says. You have no memory of this name. "Nancy? Is that you?" your mother asks. You nod your head, which only makes her more upset. "Good grief! What happened to you!? You look worse than your aunt Susan!"

This did not make any sense. Your aunt Susan has been dead for 6 years. Was this actually your mother, in the living flesh!? Was she a ghost? What kind of candy does she have in her hand? You have so many questions to ask.

But what do you ask first?

It was with a couple of cleverly used red drops that your mother was able to convince the rest of your family that 'Eddy' had never existed, that you had always been the youngest daughter, and that your name was Nancy. You watched in horror as your mother effortlessly won them over to her side, realizing that your mother was far smarter than you had ever given her credit for. Your computer, your stereo, your games consoles, they vanished into thin air, replaced with more toys and pretty little ornaments. You waited anxiously for her to test whether the wish had worked or not, and a tense silence fell between the both of you. The ticking of the clock seemed louder than ever in the deathly silence of the room, your anticipation grew with every tick. With every tock.

Two entire pints, you doubted that you could even attempt to fit that inside your small body, no matter how pudgy you were.

Your pudgy hands moved on their own accord to wrap about the heavy carton, and you tugged it closer to you. It was a little too heavy for you to lift, you found yourself adapting by tilting it instead, and clasping your mouth over the opening. You tried to stop yourself, your body simply ignored you, and the creamy milk began to pour into your mouth. It was still slightly chilled from the fridge, but warm enough to slip easily down your throat. You gulped heavily as your tiny hands tilted the carton up a little, the flow of milk increased and you almost gagged on it.

But you couldn't stop. Your stomach easily became full within a matter of moments, you felt your belly grow tighter every time you swallowed, but you still couldn't make yourself stop. You tried to see just how much milk was left, given the lighter weight of the carton between your hands, you had already drank a good amount. You should have been sick by that point, but your bloated stomach somehow managed to hold it all in. It stretched slowly to accommodate the creamy milk that was being poured into it, you wondered momentarily if that had been a side effect of your mother's request.

It felt like forever before the flow of milk was reduced to a trickle, and then to just a few drops. Your body still followed your mother's order, and you were sure to shake out every last drop of the milk, before setting the carton back down on the table. Your stomach was swollen from the two pints of milk now inside of it. It stuck out so far that only the top two buttons of your pajama were still fastened, the rest had given up completely. You touched a chubby hand to the side of your aching stomach, it felt tight to the touch, before looking up slowly at your mother.

She looked delighted from the revelation that her wish had worked. She examined you from head to toe, her gaze settling on the massive bulge of your stomach. You felt a cold shiver snake down your spine from the dark look that had entered her eyes once again. She could make you do anything, and she knew it.

"Go to bed," your mother instructed, and your feet began moving before your mind can catch up, "You have school in the morning." You moved towards the door without complaint, your stomach bouncing slightly with each step that you took. You struggled to climb the stairs with your added girth, but you made it, and padded into your bedroom. You crawled underneath the covers and cradled your aching stomach with your chubby arms.

Bedtime became a horribly routine regime for you. You would sit with your mother at the kitchen table, eat one chocolate chip cookie, and drink two tall glasses of milk. You would then kiss her on the cheek, and take yourself off to bed with no complaint. Your mind remained yours for the most part, but both your body and voice would obey whatever it was that she asked. You would clear your plate at dinner without question, you would clean your room without complaint, and you were getting top grades in school. You were the perfect child, and you could see your mother beam with pride every time that someone mentioned what a good little girl you were.

"Rainbow Drops? Never heard of them," Melina says as you and Stacey look on, worrying that she may discover the truth very shortly. She starts to read the instructions on the packet, but as she reads further on, you notice her eyes widening in disbelief. "Magic!?" Melina exclaims worryingly, "What kind of garbage is that?"

Stacey attempts to grab the attention of the confused Melina. She taps your giant sister's shoulder and explains. "They're just an ordinary bag of sweets. Nothing magical about them. I don't think that you'd like them anyway."

But to your discomfort, you imagine a light bulb flashing above your sister's head and a bright sparkle in her eyes as she looks down on you. Feeling insecure, you press your back up against the bedroom wall, dreading what was coming next.

You see a sinister smile develop on the face of Melina. "That's Eddy isn't it?"

"What!?" Stacey bellows in an attempt to put a stop to Melina's tunnel-vision, but to no prevail. As Stacey watches on helplessly, Melina crouches back down to your level. "Stacey wished that you was a tiny little girl, didn't she? At last, your girlfriend did something great for once!" Her head looked like it was big enough to block out the sun itself.

Suddenly Melina starts laughing in your face. Her breath wasn't very pleasant. She then pinches your chubby little cheeks as she mocks you. "Oh my God, aren't you sweet?" She starts talking gibberish, slightly spitting in your eyes as she does so.

"You know Eddy," Melina continues on, calming herself down and releasing her hold on your cheeks, "I really do prefer you like this. You're so much cuter. A lot easier on the eyes."

Melina is cut off as Stacey lunges in an attempt to retrieve the bag of Rainbow Drops. Melina notices this and dodges her attack. Quickly Melina plants a yellow drop in her mouth and makes a wish. "I wish that Stacey Morgan was back in her own house!" And after leaving behind a cloud of smoke, Stacey completely vanished into thin air, leaving you to face your gigantic older sister alone and in possession of your only key to returning to normal.

Your distraught to see that you are left alone to face the evil Melina, who crouches back down and faces you once again. She is far more intimidating now that she is the only giantess in the room. "As I was saying," Melina continues on from where she was disturbed.

"You're so much cuter this way. You're alot more tolerable and easier to look at." Suddenly Melina's mood begins to change to a far more darker persona. "But most importantly Eddy, you're vulnerable this way." You lump grows in your throat as Melina stares deeply into your eyes.

"You've always been pulling pranks on me, Eddy. You've tormented me and you've humiliated me. You've made my life a living hell. I've been waiting a long time for this. I'm going to enjoy this. I'm going to torment you and I'm going to humiliate you. You're my baby sister now. You've made my life a living hell. Now I'm going to return the favor."

As you much as you want to turn your head and run as far as you can, away from this tormentor and away from this house, you know that you can't. You're too afraid to even break eye contact with this tormentor. You simply stand there in fright. After a brief silence, Melina's frown is turned back upside down as she cackles to herself once more.

But what does Melina do next?
1433112.title: Helpless

choices: She takes out an Orange Drop.
She takes out a Purple Drop.
14331121.content:
As you stand helplessly in front of your sister's gigantic face, awaiting your fate in the hands of this evil witch, you jump as Melina loudly explains what she plans to do with you in your vulnerable state.

"Hey Nancy," Melina cackles, "Let's go introduce you to your other sister!"

Certainly she is referring to your 11-year old sister, Jessica Burton. As you recall, she is just as much of a pain as Melina. Can you imagine what would life would be like is she had her hands on those Rainbow Drops? She'd have complete control over you! Although you can't imagine why that should stop her now. Not while you're stuck like this!

In excitement, Melina leaps back up to her feet. You're slightly relieved that you no longer can have to put up with her breath, but next you find yourself trapped as Melina wraps her massive hand over your tiny, fragile wrist, squeezing tightly so you cannot slip out of her grip.

Melina begins lifting her tall and thick legs, walking forwards. Unwillingly you are forced to follow as she pulls your arm and drags you out of the comfort that was your bedroom. After being dragged, you finally come to terms with your footsteps, but as you maintain control, you already see Jessica, wearing a pink floral dress, rushing out of her own bedroom. At that moment, you struggle to stay on your feet as Melina continues to drag you along like a rag doll.

"Hey Jessie!" Melina catches Jessica's attention, who then looks at you with a blank expression. Jessica is well known for being curious, so it was no surprise what she would say. "Who's she?" your sister asks.

Unwillingly you are dragged further until you are within an arm's reach from your 11-year old sister. Although it was very intimidating to see Melina looming over you at first, there is no worse feeling than realizing that the youngest girl in the entire family, who last time you checked was merely 4 foot 7 inches tall, had to look down just to see the top of your head. Although you might as well face it. She's not the youngest girl in the family anymore. You now must be 3 foot 2 inches tall yourself. You must look like a toddler compared to her!

As you look up into former little sister's staring eyes, you hear Melina's loud voice booming high from above. "This is Nancy. She's your new baby sister."

It's bad enough that you have to put up with being called Nancy all of the time, but now you must deal with being called a baby sister, let alone being the baby sister to two of the most evil girls alive!

"Nancy," you hear Melina address you high from above, but you neglect to take notice. "This is your new big sister, Jessica. Say hello to Jessica." At first you refuse, but you feel a forceful squeeze from Melina's gigantic hands wrapping around your wrist like a cobra. You look up in slight pain, and you see Melina carrying the small bag of Rainbow Drops in her hand, the same sweets that put you into this mess. So you turn to face the tall Jessica, slowly wave to her with your free hand and make your greetings to her. "Hello," you say in a soft and feeble voice.

Suddenly you are overwhelmed when Jessica wraps her arms around you and squeezes tightly. As Jessica hugged you, she cried in joy. "Oh my Gosh! I've always wanted a baby sister! I'm so glad you came, Nancy!" The sound of joy in her voice was rather comforting, even though she sounded a little bit like girl younger than herself. Refusing to lose grip of your hand, you overhear Melina. "Awww," Melina sighs in response to the love that she is witnessing, "You two are so adorable!"

As Jessica slowly releases her grip, she turns to the 19-year old. "Melina, can I bring Nancy into my room please?" You look up in horror to see a content Melina reading the instructions on the bag of Rainbow Drops. Without even considering it, Melina simply responds by saying "Okay, but be gentle with her. You'll take care of her, won't you?" Jessica nods her head. "Good girl. Hang on a second," you notice Melina whispering some of the instructions to herself. You try your best to listen to what she is saying to herself.

"The red drops can alter a being's thoughts, memories and emotions." Melina looks disapprovingly into the small bag. "But this packet doesn't have any red drops. Oh wait a minute, the orange drops are basically the same. I could use this to make Eddy actually think that he is a little girl. That will show him for making fun of poor little Jessie." Melina continues reading through the instructions. "Wishes made with purple drops are completely irreversible. The only thing capable of reversing the effects of these wishes is another purple drop." You notice Melina scanning the contents of the packet and a small smile developing on her lips. "Only three? Oh what a shame."

As you overhear Melina mumbling to herself, planning on what wish to make next, you notice Jessica gripping your free hand. You were now trapped in between two rocks: the 19-year old cow hellbent on revenge and the 11-year old terror with bad intentions for her baby sister.

But what does Melina do next?
14331121.title: A New Sister

choices: She wishes that you think & act like a 5-year old girl.
She doesn't make a wish.
143311211.content:
Melina releases her grip on you. It felt like that a clamp has lost its tight squeeze on your tiny wrist. Although you could seize the opportunity to make a hasty escape as Melina is distracted, you could not, as you were still at the mercy of Jessica's tight grip. You've been on the wrong side of Jessica plenty of times. If she's capable of seriously injuring you as an 18-year old boy, imagine what she could do to a 5-year old girl? Imagine if she found out that you're actually her brother in disguise? Although the wicked witch, Melina, released her hold on you, it still felt like you were trapped between two rocks.

You watch as Melina takes out an Orange Drop from the packet. Orange Drops have the power to manipulate a being's mind, including their thoughts and memories, as well as their feelings and emotions, including love, anger and sorrow. However you should be thankful that there is no Red Drops in the packet, because the effects of wishes made with Orange Drops only last for at least 24 hours.

What does Melina wish for with the orange drop?
143311211.title: Orange Drop

choices: Jessica dresses you up in her old clothes.
Jessica takes out her old dolls.
1433112112.content:
Holding the orange drop in her hand, Melina begins to consider her plans for you and your new older sister, Jessica, who is tightly gripping your tiny wrist in anticipation for Melina to give her the signal to leave her alone with you. Melina closely examines the drop, rubbing her chin in deep thought, and suddenly puts it back in the bag. To your surprise, Melina explains herself. "I think I'll have one later instead."

"Okay, I'll leave you two alone, shall I?" Melina asks but before you could plead for mercy Jessica butts in and says "Thanks Melina!" You see Melina strut down the stairs. As her head begins to sink out of your sight your heart begins to race as you turn back to face your 11-year old sister. "We're going to have so much fun Nancy!"

It was simply mind-blowing just to be looking up in order to look into the face of Jessica, but unfortunately there was nothing you could do about it because Melina has left you alone, after making your only help disappear, and has now descended the suddenly huge staircase with the Rainbow Drops in her hand.

Jessica looks down on you with a grin on her face. "Let me show you my room," she screeches as she swiftly turns around and begins to drag you by your wrist. It was shocking how strong Jessica has become. You could tell by her strength that she would be able to lift you over her head, so you knew that you did not want to cross her now. As you struggle to keep up with Jessica's steps, you see her swing open a tall door and reveal to you a bedroom with pink wallpaper, pink bedsheets and fluffy pillows. This was the typical bedroom of an 11-year old girl. You slightly vomit in your mouth as you are forced to step foot into the room, shuddering over the fact that all of the accessories, at one point you could hold in one hand, were now the same size as your head!

You are suddenly stopped as Jessica releases her grip of your wrist. Finally you had a slight taste of freedom, but alas you knew that you could not run out of this situation, at least not for long because she could easily outrun you and then you'd suffer the consequences. Jessica looms over you like a strict parent and tells you to sit, and so feeling completely intimidated you crouch down until you slightly fall on your bottom. This point of view was very degrading as you realized that Jessica has now become an authority figure over you.

As you sat on the pink, fluffy carpet of the room pathetically, Jessica slightly bends down to bring her face level to yours. You notice the similar features on her face that she shares with Melina. With a cheeky little smile, Jessica asks you a question. "What should we do first?"

Obviously a rhetorical question that she was going to answer herself, you simply gulp in horror of what Jessica has in store for you.

What happens next?
1433112112.title: Left with Jessica

choices: Melina Burton, your older sister.
Barbara Burton, your mother.
14331121122.content:
"I know!" Excitedly, Jessica rushes into her drawers and takes out two dolls. It was obvious that she wanted to play with her dolls with you, but in any situation, you knew that you would not be caught dead with one of Jessica's dolls. Upon the sight of the dolls, you fold your arms and begin sulking to yourself.

Jessica notices you sulking and giggles. "Don't worry Nancy," she says as she approaches you with a doll in each hand, "You can play with Malibu." Jessica hands a blonde doll to you, but you refuse to grab it. Jessica offers you the doll again, but you refuse again. Jessica's constant nagging becomes more and more annoying until finally you snap, and you slap the doll out of Jessica hand. Immediately afterward do you realize the seriousness of what you have just done.

Trying to maintain a look of disdain on your face, you look up and Jessica glaring at you with tears in her eyes. She was obviously upset. You slightly begin to panic as you remember back to the last time Jessica glared at you like this, and what came afterwards. If she could hurt you as an 18-year old boy, you could hardly imagine what she could do to you now that you're a 5-year old girl!

However to your surprise, Jessica instead moves away from you and leaves the room, leaving you alone in her bedroom. Confused at first, you then realize what Jessica was doing. She was telling on you! You can't let that happen! You can't let anyone else find out about you, nor can you let Melina find out that you've upset her little sister! Worriedly, you struggle back onto your feet and approach the bedroom door.

However as you do so, the door immediately swings open. You are slightly knocked back, but as you stare out of the room, you see Jessica, only this time, she is accompanied by a much larger figure.

But who did Jessica tell on you to?
14331121122.title: Tattletale

choices: You begin shrinking
Something else happens
143311211221.content:
Jessica stood in her doorway, arms crossed, as she looked angrily down at you. Her eyes were red where she had been crying, but she had apparently calmed down. Behind her was your older sister Melina, still holding the Rainbow Drops in her hand. She had a smirk on her face, as her hand dug back into the bag of candy, before bringing it back out, empty handed. You knew she was just screwing with you, but it still left you with an uneasy feeling to know that the drops were in her possession.

Switching to an expression of seriousness, Melina put her hands on her hips and glared down at you. "Is what Jessica told me true?!" she said, doing her best to be a person of authority. "Did you actually smack a Barbie doll out of your sister's hand?! "

You swallow hard, looking down towards the floor. In a small voice, you respond, "Yes."

"Jessica, show her your arm." The 11 year old does as she is told and you see a bruise on the back of her hand, before she pulls it back, crossing her arms once more. "We don't tolerate hitting in this house. At all!"

"I'm sorry," you say, looking up at the two girls.

"You damn right you're sorry," Melina said, reaching for the Rainbow Drops again. She pours them out into her hand and your eyes go wide. "Bad little girls like you deserve to be punished." She looks at the pile, her eyes darting back and forth, before finding what she was searching for.

"Ah, here we are," Melina says, holding up a purple drop between her thumb and index finger. "This should make things all better."

"Melina? What are you doing?" you ask, afraid. You contemplate running, but at your current size, you wouldn't be able to run past the two huge girls, much less make it to the front door and escape. You just stand there, awaiting whatever cruel punishment Melina had in mind.

She puts the drop in her mouth and mumbles something under her breath. A moment later, you feel your body tingling. You couldn't hear what she wished for, but it didn't really matter, since you could see what was happening.

Your eyes go wide with panic as...
143311211221.title: Punishment Time

choices: She makes a wish.
She does something else.
1433112112211.content:
You look up in horror, as your two sisters begin to loom even larger in front of you. Jessica, who only a few moments ago was a little more than a foot taller than you, now looked like a giant, as you dwindled past her chest. Her eyes went wide, wondering how something like this was even possible.

Behind her, Melina had the most devious expression on her face, loving the fact that you were becoming smaller and more powerless by the second. To have this much control over someone, to be able to literally turn you, or anyone for that matter, into whatever she chose was an indescribable feeling. She put the bag of Rainbow Drops back in her pocket for safe keeping.

When you first began shrinking, you thought that you were getting younger again and shuddered at the thought of being a little baby at the complete mercy of your two sisters. Luckily, you were only becoming smaller, but it still gave you little comfort. After all, you were closing in on two feet tall now. Your situation was gradually getting worse.

As you neared two feet, you suddenly stopped. A little worried, Jessica bends down to see if you're all right, the anger she felt towards you instantly melting away. "Oh, my God, Nancy!" she says, as she inspects your tiny body. "Are you all right?"

Her fingers feel like thick sausages against your minuscule body, as she probes your arms and legs. "Yes, yes, I'm all right," you reply, as Jessica stands up to her full height again. You notice the top of your head doesn't even reach her belly button now, making you the smallest 5 year old girl in the world.

"What are we going to do Melina?" the 11-year old asks her sister, turning around, sounding worried. "We have to get her to a hospital!"

"Oh, something tells me Nancy'll be alright," she responds, unconcerned.

"What are you talking about, Melina? She just shrank over a foot in height!"

"Can I let you in on a little secret about our newest sibling?" the 19-year old asks, glancing down at you. You know what is going to happen, but there's nothing you can do at this point. Running isn't an option anymore.

"Yeah, what?" Jessica responds.

"Nancy is, in reality, our brother Eddy."

"Really?" Jessica says, her voice taking on a darker tone, as she turns around to face you. She looks down at you, an even angrier look on her face than before.

"That's right, sis," Melina continues, "Our little sister Nancy here, the girl you were so excited about meeting just a few minutes ago, is really our evil brother. Remember all of the times he humiliated us, breaking our toys when we were growing up and basically making our lives a living hell? Well, here he is, completely helpless and at our mercy. Just think of all the mean things we can do to him...I mean her...in return." Melina laughs a little at her unintentional mistake.

Jessica walks over to you, her large shadow enveloping your smaller body easily. She stops a few inches in front of you and without warning, shoves you as hard as she could. You go flying, slamming into her pile of stuffed animals in the corner of the room. You groan as you stand back up, amazed at the strength your 11-year old sibling has over you now.

"Well, I'd like to stay," you hear Melina say to the two of you, as she backs out of the bedroom, "But I have other matters to tend to." Just as she is about to close the door, Jessica runs up to her.

"Wait, wait!" she exclaims, stopping her. "Could I have some of those sweets please?"

"Oh, of course, sweetie," Melina responds, digging into her pocket. She grabs about 5 or 6 and hands them to the 11-year old.

"I told little Jessica here all about the Rainbow Drops when she came running downstairs crying," Melina explains to you. "I felt it was only appropriate." She grabs the doorknob, finally closing the door. "Well, have fun, you two."

"Oh, we will," Jessica says, looking over at you.

But what happens next?

1433112121.title: Permanent Baby Sister

choices: "Okay, let's get you some candy!"

14331121212.content:
It's been over a week since your transformation. You've had to put up with being a littlest girl in the family, being forced to do whatever anyone in the family wanted you to do. You had to follow Melina during some of her shopping trips, you've had to put up with being forced to eat whatever your mother wanted you to eat, and you've had to put up with being ordered around by Jessica. And over the course of the week, there has still been no sign of your former girlfriend, Stacey Morgan. Neither has there been a sign of the packet of Rainbow Drops that Melina had taken from you when this whole fiasco began.

However, on one Saturday afternoon, you were with your mother, Barbara, shopping. This was something that you used to do with your mother, and something that you'd thought that you wouldn't have to put up with again. However while walking downtown, with your mother's tight grip seemingly crushing your fragile wrist as you struggle to keep up with her pace, you notice a familiar store on the other side of the road.

It was the candy store where you bought the Rainbow Drops in the first place! Since it has been over a week since you purchased the candy, there is a great chance that they might have restocked the place, and there might be a new bunch of packets. Once you realized this, you attempt to indicate to Barbara that you want to go to the store. You attempt to break Barbara's grip, desperately trying to rush into the store, but your attempts were merely futile, until you attract Barbara's attention.

Curiously she drops down to one knee, kneeling down to your level, and asks you what is it that you want. You look and point to the candy store across the road. Barbara turns her head to follow your pointed finger, and she sees the candy store that you want to search.

But what does Barbara say to you?

choices: Yes, there was one more bag left in stock.

You smile delightfully as Barbara raises back to her feet and grabs your hand. You follow her towards the end of the curb. You notice her looking both ways, checking if the road is clear, then began to walk across the road, dragging you along by the hand.

The both of you reach the other side of the road. You then feel that Barbara's grip has loosened. She released her grip, allowing you to rush into the candy store like the child that you had become.

You push the heavy door open and rush towards the aisle where you first found the Rainbow Drops as Barbara shortly followed behind you.

143311212121.title: A Kid in a Candy Store

choices: "Okay sweetie, here's your candy."
"No sweets until you get home."

To your relief, you managed to find a bag of Rainbow Drops sitting on the bottom shelf in the far corner of the shop. You was fortunate, as it appeared to be the only packet left in stock.

Without any hesitation, you pick up the packet and rush back to your mother. You tugged on her skirt, grabbing her attention, and handed to her the packet. You watch as she looks at the packet. "This is what you want?" She asks as she looks back down at you. You nod your head as she makes her way towards the counter.

Barbara purchased the packet and grabbed your hand once more. She dragged you back out of the shop without handing the packet to you. Irritated by this, you ask if you could have your candy.

But what does she say?
1433112121211.title: One Left in Stock

choices: You wish yourself back to your normal self.
You wish that you switch bodies with someone.

To your relief, Barbara acknowledged you as she released her grip from your feeble hand and tore the packet of Rainbow Drops open. She then lowered the bag until they were within your reach. Immediately you rip the packet from her possession and begin scrounging through the bag, but not without thanking your mother with a smile of delight upon your cute little face.

Your mother waited as you searched the bag. During this search you began to recollect what your eldest sister, the one responsible for the mess that you're currently in, did to make you like this. You then remember that it was not Melina who made you what you were, as a matter of fact, it was your ex-girlfriend, Stacey Morgan, who you have not seen since her disappearance, courtesy of Melina Burton. This wish was made with a purple drop, and from what she read, nothing can reverse the effects of wishes made with these with the exception of other purple drops. You searched the bag for as many purple drops as possible, and you were fortunate to find only three drops of this color.

As Barbara watched you with a smile upon her face, it was evident that she had no clue as to what you were about to do.

You threw one of the three remaining purple drops into your mouth. You cringed at the disgusting taste of the piece of candy. While sucking upon the drop however, you made a wish.

But what was your first wish with the purple, irreversible drop?
14331121212111.title: My First Wish

choices: Melina Burton, your eldest sister.
Barbara Burton, your mother.
143311212121112.content:
As you sucked the essence of magic from the disgusting purple drop in your mouth, you ponder upon your first wish. As you do however, your mother grew impatient. Quickly she caught your hand once again, distracting you from making your wish. Her tight grip and harsh pull made it difficult for you to regain focus. It was at this moment that you rushed yourself into making your first wish, and without any hesitation, the wish was made.

Suddenly you blacked out. Momentarily you lost consciousness while standing upon both feet. You felt woozy as you regained consciousness, however things were not as you remembered.

You opened your eyes to realize that you were, in fact, in the body of a very familiar member of your family.

But who's body did you find yourself with?
143311212121112.title: Escape to Another Body

choices: In Melina's bedroom.
In George Blake's bedroom.
1433112121211121.content:
Moments later you felt completely transformed. Your chest has grown alarmingly heavier, you felt your hair reaching to your shoulders and that your legs have grown enormously.

You slowly crept your eyes open, only to realize that you were no longer outside the candy store with your mother. Neither were you cursed to live in the body of a little girl anymore, but you couldn't help but feel that you weren't out of the woods yet. Alarmed, you looked down upon your new body. The first thing you noticed was a pair of breasts bulging from your chest. You look down even further to see that you were in the body of a very familiar person in your life. You slightly shrieked, only to cover your mouth, recalling the similar screech that someone in your family used to make. As you raised your hand, noticing the similarities, you confirmed the worst. You were no longer the youngest girl in the family. You were now the eldest girl in the family. You were in the body of your 19-year old blonde bombshell of a sister, Melina Burton!
